title: Add Privacy Policy page, route wiring, footer link, SEO metadata, and sitemap entry

requirements.summary: Create a standalone Privacy Policy page at /privacy-policy with clear English content about local-only calculations, no login, no personal data collection, and third-party ad scripts.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /privacy-policy renders a non-blank page in the existing site layout (StickyNavbar + Footer).
The Privacy Policy page uses English user-facing text.
The page content explicitly states that the site does not require login and that calculations are performed locally in the browser.
The page includes a note that third-party advertising scripts (Google AdSense) may use cookies/identifiers as applicable.

file_operations.description: Add a dedicated Privacy Policy page component with readable, standalone layout and English policy text covering: no login required, no personal data collection, calculations performed locally in the browser, and a clear note about third-party advertising scripts (e.g., Google AdSense) potentially using cookies/identifiers.

requirements.summary: Make the footer Privacy Policy area include a clear clickable link to /privacy-policy while keeping the existing short summary text and design consistency.
acceptanceCriteria: On the homepage and all tool pages, the footer contains a clearly clickable Privacy Policy link that navigates to /privacy-policy.
The footer layout remains consistent with the current design system (no major visual redesign).

file_operations.description: Update the existing Privacy Policy footer section to include a clearly clickable internal navigation link to /privacy-policy (using TanStack Router link utilities), while preserving the current short privacy summary text and overall footer layout/styling.

requirements.summary: Register /privacy-policy in TanStack Router and add English SEO metadata so HeadTags updates title/meta/canonical for the new route with Student Hub branding.
acceptanceCriteria: The router includes a working /privacy-policy route.
Visiting /privacy-policy updates document title, meta description, and canonical URL via the existing HeadTags mechanism.
The /privacy-policy SEO metadata is in English and consistent with the "Student Hub" brand name.

file_operations.description: Add the /privacy-policy route to the TanStack Router route tree (wire it to the new PrivacyPolicyPage, preferably lazy-loaded like other pages). Also ensure HeadTags receives a reactive pathname from router state (not a one-time window.location.pathname) so title/meta/canonical update on SPA navigation.
Add a new SEO metadata entry for '/privacy-policy' with English title/description/keywords and canonicalPath '/privacy-policy', keeping naming consistent with the Student Hub brand.

requirements.summary: Add /privacy-policy to the static sitemap.xml so search engines can discover it while keeping robots.txt valid and still referencing the sitemap.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/sitemap.xml contains an additional <url> entry for https://studenthub.com/privacy-policy with reasonable changefreq/priority consistent with other informational pages.
robots.txt remains valid and continues to reference the sitemap URL.

file_operations.description: Add a new <url> entry for https://studenthub.com/privacy-policy using changefreq/priority values consistent with other informational pages in the sitemap; do not remove or alter existing URLs.
